post.body: OSC "open sound control"
six cameras? That's a pissed off editor.
most definitely. Good luck on the move.
I do too, except when they are sweaty. Just saying....
just got done building out at Casbah. Saw two rogue jackets... By soundboard.
no tall can and plate of bacon?
You totally should. There are some good peoples gonna be there and Holly Rolling Empire kicks ass! Say hello. I am w/vid by FOH.
would most definitely agree. Best I have had.
Congrats Chris! All the best!!!
agreed.
did you get a fresh strawberry shake at the mad greek?
GO CHARGERS!!!!
Got some good news. Will share sooooon!
New Satine episode of La Blogoteque is great! Beautiful voice.
Ryan adams was right - english girls ARE pretty when they play guitar.
New blog post: VIDEO BLOG: AVicious December 8th, 2008 http://avicio.us/?p=322
Just got done practicing with the new quartz compositions. Combined in program video feed with camera fx and flashlights for amzing fx. Hpy!
thinking about Stevie Wonder
Been working with quartz all morning. This program rocks. Laying down visual baselines. When White Noise is over for rehearsal, its on!
Its guitar center time! (Again), Happy Birthday to Jeremy Glaholt (aka White Noise)!!!
Racing home.
The reunion of reunions is in the mix!
Beauty bar
Riviera for dinner, friends party and then Apes of Wrath at Beauty Bar.
Finally on the road to studio. Waiting for people sucks.
Heading to SD tomorrow to work on Casbah show with Transfer and attend grand openning of Riviera Supper club.
LA is back to hot from cold and yet the girls wear the scarves.
Going back to Remix Hotel today. The first round was ok but the master classes are pretty solid.
Loading in.
Secret video shoot is really coming together.
Picking up van to bring gear down. Rental car employee name - Steve Urkle. Hahahahaha! Now I feel bad.
New blog post: Modlife - Transfer & AVicious http://avicio.us/?p=324
Just participated in modlife chat with The Silent Comedy. Good stuff.
Have to come up with an installation concept in one week. Tic tic tic........
...and second night w/ TRANSFER w/ AVcious Headlining - http://tinyurl.com/6hf8t4
Word is that tickets are going quickly to these shows: 1st night - http://tinyurl.com/5ef5kk
Just finished rehearsal. Very good session after we finally got White Noise's controller to work right. Special surprises for casbah show.
Looks like AVicious is solo project for first night of casbah show. Reunited for second.
Just installed WordPress 2.7. Checking it out now.
Have to rebuild the studio. Nice rainy day to do it.
In one night I have seen an oompa loompa faux fuck a waitress, a proposal and I won a patron golf bag. Nice.
The kid iis back!
Viper Room x-mas party. Would be better if 2 Transfer shows didn't ruin my liver.
This is a beautifully good time. Old and new friends ALL around!
The crowd is beautiful!!!!!!
If u r hitting up the CASBAH - come now! Seriously.
AVicious google search - Physcho punker, iLLumina record, ESL, gamerDNA, hatchet attack on teen.........
Vegin Out in San Diego is dee-licious!
Casbah setup is looking good. Changed up some things but happy so far.
San Diego has very few good hardware stores. Trying to fly a quad screen and we can't find the right rigging AT ALL.
Heading to pick up WN from train station and then do site scout of museum.
Tonight is mello. Tomorrow its the big party. You around?
The Silent Comedy Rocks!!
Just got done. Good set. Tomorrow comes the BIG AV
Heading to Casbah to get setup for show. Hope to see some of you lovely peeps.
Present wrapping, gingerbread making, fireplace roaring, Christmas Story good time!
Picking up gf from hospital. She is going to be loopy.
By the way you look fantastic in your boots of Chinese plastic.
New blog post: Solana Beach, CA - 01/29/09 - Belly Up Tavern - USA - Transfer @ Belly Up Tavern http://avicio.us/?p=353
In a break from the rain I jumped on the bike and headed for the coffee shop to get some work done. I have a good deal to get done before SD
LA is cloudy and rainy again. Coffee is delICIous on days like this.
DENVER LOSSES!!!!!!!!!!
CHARGERS WIN!!!!!!!!!!
Go Buffalo Bills!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
After a long stretch of crazy weeks I told myself I would stay in...... Man this is boring. Where's my hat!
Haven't turned off the Fleet Foxes album tonight. Sooooothing.
Why do I always wait to shop?????
New Video Blog up and rolling - check it out: http://tinyurl.com/7z35xv
Brand new Video Blog http://tinyurl.com/7z35xv
New blog post: VIDEO BLOG: AVicious 12.20.08 http://avicio.us/?p=334
